name: Prompt = Sacrifice
description:
This is my first ever released game I made for the Spooktober 2021 game jam. The theme of this Jam was Sacrifice and we had 7 days to make the game.

A massive thank you to the runners of this jam check out some of the other great games from the jam, it was greate to get a project created and finished in the given time! :D

It is mainly an exploratory game with a small amount of platforming bits.

Playtime - Around 15 minutes

Made to be played in one small sitting, no continue button.

If you enjoyed my short game and would like to see more or just have a little bit to spare I have a Ko-Fi page here. Donations are heavily appreciated no matter how much! https://ko-fi.com/dannster
